title: Kolmogorov Directions
alt: People get really grumpy when they realize you're giving them directions for how to go to the store and buy a GPS.
transcript:
[Cueball on the phone.]
Phone: How do I get to your place from Lexington?
Cueball: Hmm...
Cueball: Ok, starting from your driveway, take every left turn that doesn't put you on a prime-numbered highway or street named for a president.[Caption below the panel:]
When people ask for step-by-step directions, I worry that there will be too many steps to remember, so I try to put them in minimal form.
